title: Account Banned for Botting???
body: I tried logging into league this afternoon and got this message :After an extensive investigation, this account has been detected as having been leveled by botting. This behavior is something that is usually associated with account sales and the use of third party programs, both of which are severe violations of our Terms of Use. Because of this, your account has been permanently suspended." I know for a fact that there was no bots to level my account, since I leveled it from level 1. Anyone know what to do??

replies.body: I'd suggest reaching out to our accounts team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to get more context as to what was going on to get your account suspended. They'll be able to go into more detail than I can here on the boards, since I wouldn't want to give out any of your personal information.
